title: The Triple Fool - lines suggest about situation

content.question: In context, lines 4-5 suggest which of the following about the speakerâ€™s situation?

choices.label: His ardor has begun to cool.
His mistress is unworthy of him.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
